sources.title: The Brain Machine 1972 | Sci-Fi | James Best, Barbara Burgess | Full Movie | Subtitles
sources.description:
It Has No Conscience, It Shows No Mercy!
Several people volunteer for a scientific experiment about mind-reading and memory, but the experiment goes horribly wrong.

Original title: The Brain Machine (1972) AKA:  Mind Warp / Gray Matter / Time Warp
Director: Joy N. Houck Jr.
Writers: Thomas Hal Phillips, Christian Garrison 
Actors: James Best, Barbara Burgess, Gil Peterson 
Genres: Classics, Sci-Fi, Thriller
